channel.title: [FLASH] Actionscript
channel.description:
[b]The basics[/b] :) [size=24pt][u]Made by moi![/u][/size]
[code]stop();[/code] [b]Use in: [/b][i]Frame. [/i] [b]Action: [/b][i]Stops the animation at that Frame.[/i]
[code]on(press){[/code] [code]on(release){[/code] [b]Use in:[/b] [i]Button[/i] [b]Action:[/b] [i]Requiered to make the Button have an Action.[/i]
[code]gotoAndStop("MyFlag");[/code] [code]gotoandStop(1);[/code] [b]Use in:[/b] [i]Movie Clip, Button, Frame[/i] [b]Action:[/b] [i]Goes to your "Flag" or Frame Number and Stops.[/i]
[code]gotoAndPlay("MyFlag");[/code] [code]gotoandPlay(1);[/code] [b]Use in:[/b] [i]Movie Clip, Button, Frame[/i] [b]Action:[/b] [i]Goes to your "Flag" or Frame Number and starts the animation again.[/i]
[size=7pt]More to come...[/size]

item.title: [FLASH] Actionscript
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

on(press){
on(release){

[/quote]
I don’t use that I use…

onRelease

onPress [/quote]
What do you use… Macromedia Flash or CS3? Cause I use Macromedia

@darkdemun: LMAO. I woulda so won with no Examples

Read full topic

item.title: [FLASH] Actionscript
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

The basics
[size=24pt]Made by moi![/size]

stop();

Use in: Frame.
Action: Stops the animation at that Frame.

on(press){
on(release){

Use in: Button
Action: Requiered to make the Button have an Action.

gotoAndStop("MyFlag");
gotoandStop(1);

Use in: Movie Clip, Button, Frame
Action: Goes to your “Flag” or Frame Number and Stops.

gotoAndPlay("MyFlag");
gotoandPlay(1);

Use in: Movie Clip, Button, Frame
Action: Goes to your “Flag” or Frame Number and starts the animation again.

[size=7pt]More to come…[/size]

Read full topic
